info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 5:52PM CDT until April 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TEXAS COUNTY... At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Eva, or 12 miles south of Elkhart, moving northeast at 55 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR EVA. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported baseball size hail southwest of Eva. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Eva and Hough. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
